website_summaries.verdict: This model stands out for its ability to offer high-level suction power and a battery that holds a charge for a long time in a compact, quiet unit.
pros: We love the small size of this model, which can move around the home without becoming an obstacle to walking like some larger models
1,300 Pa of vacuum power is enough to handle the cleaning needs of the average family, and the BoostIQ technology automatically senses where more suction is needed for dirtier areas
of battery life on a full charge compares favorably with other units of this size
cons: Due to its compact size, filters may need to be cleaned more frequently than some larger models

customer_reviews.title: Ratings inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this vacuum and when I read the set up instructions, I was shocked to learn it basically needs its own room to dock in. There needs to be 6 clear feet on each side and several feet in front. It’s ironic since I purchased it for a small home never thinking it’s docking space would be an issue. I also was unable to provide this review for several weeks leading me to conclude that the ratings are inaccurate. I have to say that the customer service is excellent. Item was returned with no issues and I received an immediate response to this comment.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I loved it for the three days that it worked
customer_reviews.text: Mine broke on the third day. It was amazing for the first few days and I'm really sad that it didn't last. It kept beeping with an erroneous error code and nothing would make it reset or work again so it is getting sent back. We have tile and hard wood and a few low pile rugs and I'm very happy with how it worked but it seems I'm not the only one who had one broken right away :/
customer_reviews.author: ERutland

customer_reviews.title: Stops working and warranty not honored.
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe I bought a second one when the first stopped working and I was waiting for them to honor the warranty. Now the new one doesn't work either and I've only used it 4 times. So disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen P. Devine

customer_reviews.title: Broke 60 days after purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seems ok at first but stopped working 60 days after purchase. Drives in circles for 30 seconds then shuts itself off!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this. Buy an ilife. Much cheaper and works a lot better. This gets stuck all the time. It stops frequently. The bin isn't as big as the ilife. This does not clean in corners well. Leaves behind lots of hair. My ilife doesn't. I put my ilife upstairs and bought this for downstairs. I wanted to compare the 2.
customer_reviews.author: Desi

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS USED NOT NEW! AND NOT SENT "REFURBISHED" OR CLEANED UP
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived USED though sold as new, and was filthy. The dust tray was filled to the brim with dust and pet food and the wheels were embedded with tiny pebbles and grit. Additionally it is not even clear that the product fully works. Will be returning this but want shipping etc paid due to misrepresentation of this product.
customer_reviews.author: SLK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little robovac!
customer_reviews.text: I've been in the market for a robovac for quite some, and, after a recent back surgery, vacuuming manually wasn't easy. I purchased this vacuum and have been very pleased with it. Its slim design gets under the dressers, beds, other furniture, and all the tight spaces that I couldn't get to with an upright vacuum cleaner. This makes a very low sound while in use, and honestly, I don't even realize it's operating, as the sound is pleasant (not loud at all). The price is right at under $200, and replacement filters and so are very inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Teach3

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly cheap and awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Looking for a cheap robot vacuum that is not very noisy and also does its job extremely well? This is the vac for you! It is well design and is able to find it’s base all the time (from personal experience). It cleans carpet and wood surfaces with no problem and can even adjust its sucking strength depending on the amount of dirt it can detect. Overall I am 100% satisfied with this vacuum I call Jarvis! In order to prevent it from going to certain places I place large pillows as shown in a photo below and it can even clean a big carpet and even under the table, amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Clumsy
customer_reviews.text: It wanders around my one bedroom apartment aimlessly and if there is any sort of cable or wire exposed this thing will find it and try and swallow it I should have gotten a hand held but this seemed kind of cool don't be as lazy as me just get a handheld
customer_reviews.author: Robert W. Silvers

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious design, bit loud but worth it when you compare to others.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best cleaning robot that is affordable, I’d say I wish it had a longer battery life, but I like all the commands on the remote. I also love the sleek design on the top, very fancy. Luxurious look and design, it’s a bit loud. But who cares, it’s a hell of a lot easier to clean the house now, also... think about this, you spend nearly as much on a stand and push vacuume, you definitely use more electricity with them than you would with this. I think this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Miss blonde

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This was a great vacuum for the first two months I’ve had it, but then it stopped working. I contacted the company to get a replacement. The sent one immediately and paid for the shipping to return the old unit. I have had the new unit for just over 2 months and it has also stopped working. I wouldn’t recommend purchasing this product...I am done with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum is doing a great job. It’s much quieter than IRobt which I bought from Costco year ago. You can see from my video when the vacuum gets clos to a subject, it’s not touching the subject but turn to other direction which could help not be crashed. iRobot is not as Eufy , it must kiss on the subject. More importantly, this vacuum can clean heavy and long-haired rug and doing well but iRobot is not. Also Eufy includes more backup parts which I don’t see in iRobot package. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: On my 3rd eufy
customer_reviews.text: 3 eufy's all have separate issues including the bumpers getting stuck, the brushes wearing out after a couple days and the vacuum suction system malfunctioning. Would not recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Kimco

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vacuum. I had an issue with cat hair and kitty litter getting tracked all over my apartment, but now it's never been cleaner. This thing goes over drugs very well and cleans like a dream. It usually has troubles getting back to the charger when it's done, but I just find it when I get home and put it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: It’s a waste of money and time. I’m 20 days pst my return date. So I have a $200 robot that doesn’t pick up everything, brushes dirt into corners and cannot stop falling down the stairs. I finally went back to my old vacuum because it takes less time and energy to plan on cleaning my floors. It always gets stuck and now I’m stuck with it. :o(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed in Eufy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this for the week or two that it worked. Then suddenly it would not. I am so disappointed. The blog and chat sites are not available . This company would have a wonderful product but this problem ( as I’m now finding is common) needs to be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: charles Moe

customer_reviews.title: Misses a lot and doesn’t get under cabinets
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this but have been so disappointed that I will be returning. The battery life could be way better and it doesn’t pick up from around the base of my cabinets or loveseat and will miss picking up lots of things on the floor. I keep my house pretty clean but I have a toddler and two dogs so got this to help with dropped snacks and to give me one less thing to do but I have to go behind and sweep anyways. Will be purchasing a different brand. **Edit to add: they do not offer free returns. I didn’t notice this when purchasing.**
customer_reviews.author: bnb13

customer_reviews.title: Fell down my stairs! Lots of damage
customer_reviews.text: It’s supposed to sense the edge of the stairs so it doesn’t fall down a flight. First time running it o watched it fall down my wood stairs, bouncing on every other step, occasionally crashing (denting) my wall. All. The. Way. Down. Yay clean carpets. Oh no, damaged wood stairs and drywall. Fresh out of the box bad sensors? Bad design? Coding? This thing sucks. One star because it caused actual damage to my house.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had a pretty rough first engagement with our first Eufy robovac which gave me a really bad taste in my mouth after spending so much time searching for a solid machine. However, my engagement with their customer service has been unmatched by any company I have dealt with. I am convinced that it was a one off bad experience and am giving them a chance to rectify the problem. Whether you have a good or bad first engagement, EUFY will take care of you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't pick up much. Bought it because some group rated it best for pet hair, but it doesn't pick up much of anything! Best I can say is it is great entertainment for the dog. He chases it and barks. Company has great customer service. Went above and beyond to take item back and refund purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Rourke

customer_reviews.title: Re-Review Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: i have had this for several months now and had given it a poor rating early on. It didn’t work well for a large multi-room house, however have used it smaller rooms since. It has performed very well there , am happy with it, and wish to commend the company for a the concern they had shown from my earlier rating. Quiet and has good battery run time. I can recommend this product for use in more average designed homes. Ours is large open with multiple rooms, so one with gps did better for that portion. A very good product and price. I rate the company outstanding for standing behind it
customer_reviews.author: dan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome so far
customer_reviews.text: We have hardwood floors throughout our first floor, with only two small low rugs. This robot has done a great job so far. He (my wife has named him Jacob for some reason) has only gotten tripped up on cords so far, so prior to sending Jacob on his way I just do a quick sweep for cords. As others have stated, even if you think your floors are clean, this will find the dust. Really happy with the purchase, especially the price. Update: I added a video to show how it can fit even in tight places
customer_reviews.author: Joseph M Zenevitch

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product. I have a dog that sheds, and this saves me so much time now. It fits under my bed, dresser, coffee table, etc. Only issue I've had is that it fits under my couch, but gets stuck because the height is not the same all the way under it. Not a big deal. I can find a way to block off the underside of the couch to avoid this. Put all of your cords and loose items away, and this will work wonders. Takes 5 seconds to empty the canister and charges quickly. Mine found the charging station on its own right away.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Floor Scratcher 5000
customer_reviews.text: Yep, in my house this is referred to as the Floor Scratcher 5000. I had new hardwood floors installed and they were beautiful however, the daily dust floating in the air was noticeable so this was my solution. At first I loved this thing, it saved me from obsessively sweeping daily. I was so happy at its initial performance that I announced on my personal facebook page how it was the "best day ever" but now my new floor is covered in scratches, after. All over. I try not to think about it too much or I'll end up in tears. Maybe I should've gone with a name brand but do yourself a favor and skip this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hopefulforinspiration

customer_reviews.title: RUN THE OTHER WAY!!! DO NOT BUY!!
customer_reviews.text: FAKE REVIEWS!!! DO NOT BUY THIS PIECE OF JUNK!!! This thing constantly gets stuck. When I say constantly I mean two or three times a day. It also goes to the same spot for some unknown reason. I have had two Roomba’s in the past and they did fine in my house. The Roomba also had towers to keep it from going into other rooms which this Eufy model does not have. This model also does not have a app. The only thing Eufy has over the Roomba is it is quieter. I do not understand how this things has all the good reviews when you can get a lot more in a Roomba for a slightly more money.
customer_reviews.author: Hunkin

customer_reviews.title: It works great and I will be by again
customer_reviews.text: My post is very very late But after my post in my frustrations I received a new vacuum very quickly and hit it has worked amazingly
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why spend $800 for other models?!?!?!?!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe i'm writing a review for a robotic vacuum... but this thing is insanely awesome. I vacuumed my living room and dining room with my Dyson (only 1 year old) then decided to let the Eufy have a go. You would not believe how much dirt and fibers this thing picked up in a matter of minutes. My husband and I were floored!! It's simple to use, sleek, fits under all of my furniture and puts itself away to recharge automatically. Truly awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: The parts are also replaceable too and I have only heard good things about their online support
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I are clean / neat freaks in the home. We were very skeptical upon purchasing, even though this product had 4.5 stars. I do not ever write a review, not even a simplistic one, but I just wanted to add to the status quo that this product works very well. The remote control features, along with charging station and scheduled cleanups make this an enjoyable product to use. Eufy can also transition from surface to surface with ease, from bamboo, tile, and then carpet. The parts are also replaceable too and I have only heard good things about their online support.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: It does everything as advertised (and exceeds my expectations)
customer_reviews.text: Upon it's arrival I turned it on and plugged in the charger. This quiet little vacuum immediately began traversing my house easily coping with hardwood floors, carpet, area rugs, and transition strips. After a little more than 2 hours it returned to it's cradle to recharge (I didn't fully charge the battery before unleashing it the first time). The bin was full and it emptied easily. The recharge took a couple of hours and it was back off again. So far, so good - for under $200 shipped!
customer_reviews.author: Rob in the Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Poor Customer Service, but Great Product
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received was defective. I contacted their customer service department, sent them a photo as requested, and didn't hear back from them until after I had finally taken matters into my own hands - returned the product to Amazon for an exchange & received the new one. Now that I have had it for awhile - I love it!! Works beautifully for me and as indicated, it's battery life is enough to get my 2150 square foot home done...it's easy to clean...and best of all, it's quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Jacks Son

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: I loved this vac. I felt that it actually cared about me it was the only one who helped clean the house without asking. My kids its and act of congress to get them to help me. It was working fine then just started getting lost in places. I would lovingly carry U back to the charger and let him recharge. Then he started just coing off the charger turning in circles an exclaiming his battery was dead. Even leaving on charger for 24 hours did not work. I would love for U to work again he was the most helpful thing in my house. If any one knows how to fix please leave comment.
customer_reviews.author: Mellissa willette

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Not comparable to other robot vacuums at all.
customer_reviews.text: This stupid thing gets stuck under the couch every single time it turns on. We bought the barrier stuff to try to stop eufy from perpetual entrapment- nope, eufy is useless and the barrier tape is useless. If you live in a home without furniture to trap eufy you’re still screwed. This little sh** just blows pet hair around. Whatever it does pick up gets immediately stuck in the bristles. I’m so mad at myself that I missed the 30 day window to return it. Sweeping or vacuuming takes way less effort than freeing the dumb robot and clearing out the brush roller over and over again. You can never tell that eufy cleaned. Such a garage machine.
customer_reviews.author: ADHD

customer_reviews.title: Love my Molly Maid
customer_reviews.text: No regrets on purchasing Eufi (I named her my Molly Maid). Although I have to carry her to different rooms, as I have multiple pet gates between them; she does perform perfectly. The base can stay constant, I just program the single room, and here it goes for about 30 minutes. The rooms need just a little adjustment to get them Molly Maid ready, the results are nice clean rooms. Also easy to clean and not so messy at all, while cleaning, as many other vacuum cleaners are. Can't beat this service!!
customer_reviews.author: Antje Kromberg

customer_reviews.title: Horrible
customer_reviews.text: Works fine when it doesn’t get stuck under couch. I called and spoke with them about the issue and they told me to try and put something under sofa to prevent it from getting stuck, first off I don’t want to put something under my couch that would be hideous even though I did try to just because I want to use it but it didn’t work and plus I spent enough money on this for it to be able to work properly with no problems. They were unable to resolve this issue for me so with that being said if u don’t have a couch it’s great if not do not buy !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So upset.
customer_reviews.text: I have wanted one of these for years. I finally decide to buy one and it works for 4 days. We didn't even use it consistently and we cleaned before starting it to avoid anything big messing it up. It just stopped and started beeping. We have cleaned it , emptied the tray, even took the tools off that come with it. I'm hurt! I dont think I have ever written a bad review like this. Unfortunately we threw the box away on day 1.
customer_reviews.author: Chasidy H

customer_reviews.title: It's a decent aimless wanderer
customer_reviews.text: It took me 4 or 5 times trying out robots from Amazon to see which one would work best for me. I live in a 2-bedroom loft and have a short haired dog who sheds on the reg. This one (although gets clogged up every 3-4 cleans) does the best job for a cheaper caliber robot. I would recommend a higher end robot for those who live in anything over 1200sqft. It does get stuck once a week and you just reset it on the floor and push the button to restart it. I recommend it for those who want a cheap priced robot for pet hair.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsie

customer_reviews.title: Like having a maid!!!  Thanks Eufy!
customer_reviews.text: Eufy is a great product. I highly recommend for those with hardwood floors. I have to clean the filters after every use. Which means it collects a lot of dirt and debris. It picks up particulates too. The only con I have is that the filter fills up quick and you have to remember to brush the filters after every use. So far I’m impressed. It’s like haveing a made. I’d say it paid for itself by now.
customer_reviews.author: Art

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pick up hardly anything!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this robo vac because lord knows I am sick and tired of wasting time vacuuming my house and I don't like strangers coming into my home to clean it so I thought this would at least help me to stop having to vacuum my house every week. I followed the directions to the T and this thing kept on driving over debris and it flickered around other debris without even trying to pick it up. Hardly any suction what so ever. I really do believe many of these reviews are fake because this piece of crap didn't do anything. It only gets 1 start because it's a cute, lovely piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Gapeach

customer_reviews.title: Sooo much quieter than a Roomba!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a Roomba for years. When it broke, I didn't want to pay the high price for a new Roomba so I decided to try this one. I didn't think I would like it as much but I was wrong!! This one is sooo much quieter!! It sounds like a soft fan running. It is also slimmer than a Roomba so it doesn't get stuck under things like the Roomba did. Very awesome vacuum cleaner, especially for the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with my new eufy robovac
customer_reviews.text: I bought eufy robs ax according the good reviews, my first vacuum was not good and we had a problem with the timer. Customer Service reached out to us immediately after we returned it and they offered to replace it. We received the new robovac, tried it again and it’s working great now. The company has excellent customer service and they are behind their product 100%. I will definitely refer family and friends to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: sara bek

customer_reviews.title: should bought it long time ago
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase. It is very quite and cleans everywhere especially under the beds, sofa and other furniture. After we had this little thing, we had never used our big vacuum cleaner. After each time of cleaning, just open the dust collect box, you will see how good the work has been done for you. The only thing we need to do is to make sure the wires around the house are organized well, not to lay around the floor or put it behind the object that will block the path. This one definitely get the job done. highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvester

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 37 days
customer_reviews.text: Was great until the brush motor on the left side decided to go out on day 37. So now I have a broken 37 day old robotic vacuum that I'm stuck with. Amazon didn't allow me to post my first review. 😕 The seller still hasn't contacted me back. So if your device breaks like mine you'll be finding yourself with a headache and no resolution. And amazon trying to censor reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Brad Janowski

customer_reviews.title: A must with pets!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this thing! The hardest part was waiting for it to fully charge so I could play with it. I have 4 dogs (one of which is a husky) and 2 cats. This picks up so much hair it's kinda gross lol. Easily glides under beds, dressers and night stands. The only thing was it got hung up on the wires under the bed (for the adjustable base) and unplugged them. But that was might fault for not securing them. It has no problems transitioning from tile to hardwood to carpet. Even cleans throw rugs without moving them. Great price (I purchased during prime days). I love coming home to clean floors!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: These reviews are garbage. This didn’t last a year. A tire fell off, the dust pin doesn’t stay closed when removing, and the dust pin doesn’t fill up all the way. This was a horrible investment and is only a short term solution.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of robot vacuums, but just moved into a house with 1100 sq ft of plank floor. With the neighborhood still under construction, we were tracking in a lot of dirt and debris. A friend recommended this vacuum and I took the gamble because of the price. WOW! This thing is amazing!! In its first month, I’ve run it every other day and it picks up everything!! Quieter than our regular vacuum, so we forget it’s even running. Hasn’t got caught up on area rugs or doormats either. The only problem it had was the bases on the pedestal chairs. Now, we flip them on the counter and all is good.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

customer_reviews.title: Reorganizes the mess, picks up nothing after 4 months.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing in march. A month ago it died in the middle of my floor, I figured it ran out of battery and couldn’t find its way back. I set it back and I started finding dirt and then one day I spilled some pine needles, dry and small. I set it there and noticed it was not vacuuming at all it was just “reorganizing” the mess and kept going past it without even going through the whole mess. I cleaned and checked everything to make sure it was properly set up. Nothing, kept spitting out what little it picked up, no suction at all. Now it’s just a piece of junk!
customer_reviews.author: MMM

customer_reviews.title: MY FLOOR HAS NEVER LOOKED SO CLEAN!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this vacuum for approximately 18 months and I have used it more than 600 runs!!!!!!!! It is on a timer and runs every morning and if I have been working hard outside and/or have guests I turn it on before I go to bed. I also run it upstairs 2-4 times a week!!! I have used it more than a combination of all my vacuums in my lifetime. the simplicity of cleaning I literally clean it throughly 1 time per month. Keep in mind this in the perfect vac for you ONLY if you keep your floor free from clutter. Definitely would buy another in the future!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Momcat2002

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical, but this little guy works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Has a timer for operation, great suction (I have a cat, so hair is a problem) ' battery lasts at least 4 hours a day operating without charging. Remote control is fun too - Kids should have a blast with this. Price is great for what you get, easy to empty the dirt storage bin, and unlike the older Roombas, this knockoff will not suffer from the "black carpet been seen as a cliff" bug that plagued the 1st Gen Roombas. This thing is like a mini tank, It will zoom over just about everything in the room so be prepared. Cons: Non that I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Impressive Device!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was #2 on the best robot device reviews based on price & function. I purchased it based on a great price. I have used it a few times in the past week and am impressed. The height is a big factor for me --- It is able to get under my beds, chairs, and sofas without an issue. Anker includes zip ties and that was smart because the device has an issue with electric cords. Once you get them out of the way, the robot does its job very well. When compared to the competition, I can't imagine this device being outdone at the price I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Atlanta Mike

customer_reviews.title: Broke within <12 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this vacuum to help us with the breadcrumbs and other food items our two toddler daughters regularly drop around the dinner table. Unfortunately, it broke within less than 12 months of light use. The right front rotor does not stop spinning and often suddenly makes an awful sound (while not cleaning properly anymore). We have tried everything to get it going again to no avail. I had high hopes for this but, unfortunately, not recommended at all! Perhaps better to go with the original instead of off-brand low-quality copies.
customer_reviews.author: Nils

customer_reviews.title: WiFi would make it perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased and used 3 different robot vacuums. This one is the quietest and handles my medium carpet like a champ. The reason I decided to return it is because it doesn’t have WiFi and connect to my phone. It will get stuck and beep but if I’m upstairs, I can’t hear that. So the job never gets done. If it had the ability to tell me on my phone then it wouldn’t stay stuck. It’s perfect for a small home where you can hear the beep.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best in it's class. A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly cannot tell you how good that robotic vacuum is. I've been simply blown away. After sampling a few others, I was sort of expecting the same old story with this one, but wow I could not have been more wrong. This vaccum is clearly a cut above the rest. Easy to setup, easy to use, and does a far better job cleaning than i could do with a standup vacuum. Just wow. A++++
customer_reviews.author: Navaro

customer_reviews.title: Flippin’ fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical, but this little robot is fantastic. We use it on our kitchen laminate flooring. Cons? It’s not “smart” in that it will not learn a room. Pros? It does a fantastic job of picking up crumbs/light debris. Sure, you could use a broom and be done 10x faster- but what fun is that?! The remote has a nice directional feature so you can guide it to a particular area in your room that has dirt. There is an odd satisfaction in having a personal robot clean up your mess... before they enslave the human race.
customer_reviews.author: wak215

customer_reviews.title: EUFY not so good after 15 Months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this thing when it first arrived. It picked up a dog load of pet hair from under beds (hardwood floors) and dirt and dust from unknown places. Was so impressed that we bought a few more for presents to extended family. However, after 15 months it's actually spitting hair out now. This is after cleaning the machine thoroughly, replacing brush heads, filters, etc.... Now we're back to the old standard vacuum and Eufy only comes out once a week because it just can't keep up. IMO, not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: foolish69

customer_reviews.title: Life saver!
customer_reviews.text: Why did I not buy this sooner?! This thing has been a little miracle around my house. I have all hardwood floors / linoleum. I also have two dogs, a cat, and two kids. As you can imagine, my floors were always dirty. I was having to sweep them multiple times a day! I bought this thinking that if it helped even a little it would save me time. But this thing gets full of dirt and hair on a daily basis. I honesty can’t figure out where it’s all coming from. Every day I empty it and every day it’s full. Best purchase I’ve made all year!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product trusting that Amazon has a responsive assistance if something goes wrong. Unfortunately the disk is not working. I have charged two different times and as soon as I get the cleaner out of its charger it stops the blue light and will not work. The product came without a manual, which made it even more challenging. I called amazon hoping for a technical assistance, instead the representative told me was going to send a "troubleshooting" guide, but sent me an email with 3 recommendations, one of them unplug and plug again. I'm so disappointed ed with Amazon and its "technical service". I'm returning the vacuum now.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: KEEPS. GETTING. STUCK!!
customer_reviews.text: EDITED TO ADD: Turned on the vacuum today and it won’t pick up anything. I’ve kelt the filter cleaned, made sure the rollers are clean regularly and it’s not sucking at all. Total piece of shit.... At first, we loved this robot. Now, I’m wishing I would’ve looked further for one. It is CONSTANTLY getting stuck. In places it never did before.... under beds, on rugs, going over a transition from hardwoods to travertine?! I’m not sure what’s going on with it. It’s been the most frustrating thing ever. First week of having it we decided we would order another. Before we ordered the one we had started having the issue. We won’t be ordering anymore at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Paid for itself
customer_reviews.text: This vac is well worth the money. My wife lost a stone from one of her diner rings and was upset when we could not find it. We let the vac do its thing and several days later when I was emptying the dust catcher there was the gem stone. We could not believe that the vac found it after we had hunted all over. I love the low profile, ease of cleaning and quite compared to our aunt's Roomba. Update, We had a problem with the battery charging. Called Eufy and they said "no problem we will send out a new battery free of charge." That is what I call great customer service. Thanks, Christin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Eufy is quiet and highly effective
customer_reviews.text: I have only had my eufy for a couple of days I'm so far I'm highly impressed it's very quiet it holds quite a bit I have emptied it before it's told me it needed it and it makes its way around the house with no problem it does have issues in the dark so I make sure there's light lol so far I haven't had any bad issues with it you and I look forward to very clean floors and just so you know I have all hardwood floors there's no carpeting in my home. It did startle my dog at 2:30 last night, it was looking for its charging station lol
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Easterwood

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I have been so pleased with my Eufy that I have talked several family members into purchasing one. They have all been pleased as well. This past Sunday, Eufy stopped working. I was ready to buy another one but I decided to call the company on Monday to see if I could just buy the part. I spoke to a representative named Rion. He was so helpful. He asked me a few questions and then sent a brand new one to me. I received it 2 days later. Now that’s customer service! I highly recommend this vacuum. I have 2 dogs that shed so I was constantly vacuuming. Now Eufy cleans just about every night for me.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Game changer for Husky parents
customer_reviews.text: We have mostly hardwood, so keep that in mind! I have two huskies and two cats and fur maintenance throughout the house is a full time job. This is a HUGE game changer. I set it loose once a day and all my little tumbleweeds of fur are gone. You will likely still need to vacuum with a Dyson or something similar a few times a month (especially if you have carpet). But this makes what use to be a daily chore into a biweekly chore. Amazing. I will edit this review if I see any significant performance changes throughout the year. But if I don't edit it, it means I'm sticking to this glowing review.
customer_reviews.author: Shakespeare Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum!! Super quiet compared to other models I've had and really does a great job on our tile floors. I'm not sure how it performs on actual carpet, but it easily gets on our rugs and does what it's supposed to! It's almost disgusting the stuff it gets, but makes me so thankful with the click of a button that I'm able to have it run. It doesn't go in any specific pattern, but it does a nice job getting all spots/corners/rooms. My only complaint is that it doesn't always go back to charge itself, but for the price & ease of use...doesn't bother me at all! Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first robot and I LOVE IT! I have twin toddlers plus my niece, a husky, a German Shepherd, a cat, and have 3 adults living in my home. I used to find myself sweeping multiple times in a day because the floor was always messy with food crumbs, pet hair, cat litter crumbs, whatever else my crowd got into. I haven’t swept since I got this bot. It’s amazing and my floors stay clean. I have to use it two times during the day and once when I go to bed, and I wake up to perfect floors. It’s wonderful. One less stress during my day. I love it! Gonna get my mother one for her birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: This Eufy does drop down stairs
customer_reviews.text: I tried many robotic vacs, this one is great for what it mainly does. I have two cats, hairs gets everywhere and this vacuum sucks it all up plus more. Because of its power, it does get louder than others, but I gladly trade it for the power it has. My only complaint, and it is one that will be addressed is that is does not sense stairs. When I moved into my house from my apartment, this eufy has run off down the stairs twice. The sensors or technology for this does not work well and I am afraid in time, it will break. Besides that one major issue, this Eufy is great.
customer_reviews.author: jstubbs88

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but............
customer_reviews.text: I have had both vacuums just over a year. The one upstairs runs on carpet, after 6 months had to be sent in do to an issue, the warranty was great, replaced no issues. Now the second one for the down stairs that runs on hard floors, just after a year it started make a loud noise and now it stays in one spot and does circles. Warranty was only for a year, so now I am out on the vacuum. Guess sometimes going with the best bang for your buck, you get what you pay for. Brushes have to be cleaned a lot also or replaced running on carpet or with hair.
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: I have a good cleaning partner
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and easy to clean. I bought this vacuum two years ago. I use it every day and still going strong. No regreats. Would love to buy another one as a back-up just in case......but there are no signs that this machine will go out on me anytime soon. My life has been a lot easier for the past two years. I hated coming home to sweep my hardwood floors because all the loose hair from our lovable pit bull. My floors are now clean every day before I came home from work. I am now retired from work and from sweeping floors! Give it a 5 star on all the aspects.
customer_reviews.author: lucy

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE our Eufy! We jokingly tell our kids she is our favorite child! She is just so willing to work hard and programming her and just letting her run every day is a delight! I’ve had friends stop by while our Eufy is running and say they can’t believe how well she picks up compared to their Roomba! We highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Two Bibliomaniacs

customer_reviews.title: Not good if you have rugs
customer_reviews.text: After my Roomba died I figured I’d give this a try. It’s super quiet and does great on hard surfaces. Downside is there are always tuffs of fur left beside the edge of a rug, doesn’t seem to have enough suction to be able to go on the rug without leaving dirt behind. If you’re looking for something to help make the floors look nice so you don’t have to spend every day vacuuming this is a great option. If you’re looking for something so you don’t have to vacuum but once every few months...this isn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCabe

customer_reviews.title: Almost a year and still going strong!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this vacuum for almost a year. It was on sale and I decided to try it before I jumped off into the more expensive Roomba. I have 5 long hair cats, 1 short hair cat and this little guy is my best friend! His name is "Buzz" and he is the best! No Wi-Fi-but seriously doubt I would use this feature. It's great on hard woods-which was why I purchased it. Carpet it does OK. I love this vacuum and encourage anyone to try it! Oh, customer service most excellent but this was a follow up after purchase by them. I have had no issues with vacuum!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning up dog hair!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard great things about this vacuum, but I was hesitant to buy one due to the fact that we have dark colored natural slate floors in some areas. When I saw the prime day deal it was too good to resist and I couldn't be happier with me purchase! Honestly, even at regular price this vacuum is well worth it! We have a large dog that sheds like crazy and I have gone from having to sweep twice a day to once every few days. This thing has been amazing at cleaning up dog hair and has saved me so much time and hassle daily. I highly recommend the Eufy to anyone looking for a quality robot vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Tank

customer_reviews.title: Smart vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I received my robot in one day! I have two dogs that shed. My vacuum cleaner stopped working so I thought I would invest in this vacuum. Not having a vacuum for a few days my low pile area rug was very hairy! The robot couldn’t clean it perfectly so I had to clean it first. It picks up pretty well especially on my hardwood floors. It sometimes spits out a little clump of hair but eventually picks it up. I love the way it finds its way home to recharge. All in all I like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Langella

customer_reviews.title: Quiet but don’t rely on the drop sensor
customer_reviews.text: It’s very quiet compared to my Roomba. However, if you have stairs, be warned. This thing drops off my stairs every single time. Cleaned the sensors, but it makes no difference. I had it for about a week, and every time I come home, Eufy was down the stairs. Cliff sensor is unreliable — nothing like what they advertised. Look at the damage it did to my wall and shattered glass on a picture frame. This one is going back to Amazon. ---------- UPDATE: Changing to 3 stars b/c of customer service. They replaced it with RoboVac 30 (which comes w/a strip to create a boundary) and also sent me a free Anker USB-C charger.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Not meant for animal hair and minimal suction
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed with this product. All the good reviews I was hoping for a good vacuum. This did not match up to my needs. 1500SF home with two dogs. It didn’t properly suck up the dog hair and just twirled it around leaving large clumps all over the place. It didn’t seem to have a strong suction to really grab dirt off the floor either. The patterns it made around the home didn’t help and didn’t get the large rooms corners and side walls. I ended up returning it. I really needed a dog hair maintainer and this vacuum is not good at all for doing that. My floors are all tile too so this should have been easy?
customer_reviews.author: Darina B.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing robot vacuum
customer_reviews.text: We named ours Hal. Everyone loves Hal. He runs every day at 1230pm. He's set on full power and usually cleans for 1.5hrs. Every other day I empty tray, blow out filters and clean brushes. Hal likes being pampered. It's amazing how much dog hair he vacuums up! Hal is one of the best Amazon purchases we've ever made. Its been 2-3 months and we just ordered a new brush and filter kit. Seems brushes and filters will last about a month each when cleaned out regularly.
customer_reviews.author: AZYJ92

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy this again
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and for about 1 month it was fine. Then it started randomly stopping and beeping for no reason. Even after cleaning and buying new components it still would randomly stop and beep, about 1.5 months it stopped going back to the charge station so I have to find it and go put it on charge. the spinning brush wont rotate anymore because the rotating component broke and it also goes by itself now when its not set for auto timer no matter what I have done it wont stop going by itself. Very very upset with everything that is already broken on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: brent evans

customer_reviews.title: Updated review
customer_reviews.text: Update: customer service is 5 stars. They sent me a replacement, and the new one has been working without any issues for months now. It turns out it is a great product and the company strives to provide a great customer experience. It worked well in the first two months, then started having difficulty sucking. We cleaned it’s filter regularly and it was mainly used on hardwood floor. On third month, the sucking power got worse is really disappointing. I am not sure now if this is worth its price. It might be better to pay a bit more for a Roomba.
customer_reviews.author: Nelson A.

customer_reviews.title: Inadequate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product December 12, 2019. We use it only once or twice a week. On this day June 5, 2020, the unit has ceased to charge and is now inoperable. My expectation is that this RoboVac would definitely last longer than just short of 6 months. Most people that have this type of devise use it on a daily basis and still rave about after owning one for over a year and a half. I cannot endorse this RoboVac at this time unless the sender makes this right. I will come back with final review
customer_reviews.author: Lynn McGhee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! - It doesn't do any of what it promises!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this model for weeks and it's never properly cleaned. It consistently gets stuck around furniture and/or the charge dies before it cleans most of the floor. It has never found the home base after cleaning. And the remote never worked with the machine. Truly a waste of money. Customer service was worthless and said it's past the return date and functioning as it's supposed to so there is nothing they can do. Clearly not functioning is their version of functioning as it's supposed to. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying, plastic gears fail
customer_reviews.text: Worked great up until the window for refund/return closed , now it is making internal grinding noises like a gear is mashed . All my floors are vinyl and it should not have a heavy workload. Sent new unit in Dec. 2/2020, now on second unit and plastic gears are stripping again wish I could get my money back and buy a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: The slimmer design allows the vacuum to go under beds and some furniture. It does a pretty thorough job though it seems to “wander” randomly at times. Closing doors to rooms already done helps. We don’t have pets and our floors are half carpet & half tile or wood. It does a good job on both. See after pic of carpet. I like that it has a feature to do edges only which is nice if those get missed. This is our first robotic vacuum and we definitely are pleased. I’ve recommended to my friends!
customer_reviews.author: LisainSA

customer_reviews.title: Adequate
customer_reviews.text: We've had this guy for over a year and it has been great, so far. We use it daily on our main level which is hardwood with a few rugs. It rarely gets stuck and is independent in that way. We have two small dogs (Yorkie and Maltese) and they do shed a bit. This RoboVac does great with picking up their hair. We empty it once or twice a week and every time it does not seem to be overly full. The remote it comes with is handy as well.
customer_reviews.author: webb

customer_reviews.title: Update: Battery died after less than six months!
customer_reviews.text: Battery will no longer charge. Ordered the robot 6/21/18. It’s now 12/16/18. Not what I call durable. Within days of my original review, Eufy customer service reached out to offer advice and make amends for the faulty device. Much appreciated, Eufy. Crossing fingers the prior failure was a rare event, and I’ll hope that the new Eufy lives a long, productive life in my household. Whether or not that happens, I have to hand it to Eufy for proactive, polite and eager-to-please customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SeattleMom

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am very happy with my Eufy. It is a great machine to supplement your regular vacuuming . I Running it about twice a day and it is very quiet never disrupting anything that we’re doing. It does pick up a lot of dust and hair but you do need to clean it after each use. The battery life is adequate. You will still need a more powerful vacuum to do the deep cleaning such as picking up embedded pet hair an area rugs. My house definitely look it’s a lot better since I’ve gotten it.
customer_reviews.author: kpezzulo

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend and their customer service is amazing (spoke with ASHLEY)!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have been super happy with our eufy robo vac!!!!! It totally does the job, we have hard wood floors as well as carpeting and use it for the entire house. We've had ours for almost a year now and are just having our first issue. I called customer service and spoke to ASHLEY and she was incredibly helpful, quick, professional, knowledgable, and answered ALL of my questions and importantly took care of my issue. It was the easiest call to a company I have ever witnessed. I am extremely pleased with my robo vac and knowing that their customer service is also great really makes me happy with our purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: Actually, I didn’t have very high expectations for the Eufy (or any robo vac). However, I’ve been pleasantly surprised. With two dogs and all hard floors, lots of debris and hair accumulates. What I like: cleans under furniture, picks up dogs hair like a champ and it vacuums while I do other cleaning. What I learned the first few times I used the Eufy: watch it vacuum each room. The things I thought I needed to pick up, I didn’t and the things I thought wouldn’t cause a problem, did. I do not use Eufy for “deep” cleaning- just to help me keep up with day-to-day sweeping. Hope this is helpful
customer_reviews.author: flamingogirl

customer_reviews.title: What is deep clean?
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I purchase this sooner? I have a 1300 square foot condo. Two floors. All carpeting except for the kitchen. I am having severe neck, back, and shoulder problems to the point where vacuuming is becoming very difficult. I figured I'd get this for in-between cleanings. Well, I don't know what they mean by deep clean because I can't believe what this baby picks up. I've been running it every night on my living room/Dining room carpet and am amazed at the dust. I keep a VERY clean house and still it is picking up dust and hair. Amazing! Worth every penny!!
customer_reviews.author: skater

customer_reviews.title: Where has eufy been all my life?1
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Eufy has changed our lives! I love that it picks up dust from our vinyl plank flooring. We have 2 dogs in the house. At first hair quickly accumulated in the vacuum dirt cup. But with more regular use this is no longer a problem because of course there is not as much hair everywhere. I also love that it is only 3" tall so it goes under our furniture without the work of having to move it. There is some planning involved with confining electrical cords so it doesn't get caught up. Overall I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vols Fan

customer_reviews.title: Learned more about myself
customer_reviews.text: I got this cause I do a majority of the cleaning and the thought of having one less thing to worry about is nice. This is the type of vacuum that does one level and vacuums in a zig zag pattern (randomly) for about an hour managing to get every area of my 1,100 sqft home. After being a helicopter parent for the vacuum (picking up cables, taping down rugs) I got comfortable enough to let it run while I’m at work. Most days I come home and it’s done, few days the vacuum has a shoe in it’s mouth and I laugh. Nice cheaper alternative
customer_reviews.author: T. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Works amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for the start but now at 4 months old one of the side spinning brushes makes loud clicking noises and doesn't spin on carpet. Updated review: Contacted Eufy support and they got back to us right away. They gave us a pre-paid packing label to send our broken Eufy back. We sent it back and a couple days later they emailed us informing that are new Eufy is on the way along with some string lights as an apology for the inconvenience. We received it within a week and it's been working great ever since. We are extremely satisfied with their customer service. And we really love the lights! Highly recommend to friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: We had a roomba for years until it finally wore out so we decided to go a little less expensive with the Eufy. Initially we had some issues with it falling down the stairs and getting stuck. We notified Eufy company and experienced the best customer service we’ve ever experienced. They immediately replaced our Eufy with a newer model, free of charge. The new Eufy has worked out great, no issues but a clean flooor! Great company!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't clean well and is quite dumb
customer_reviews.text: I use this product mostly on hardwood floors and an area rug. I was very excited to get my first robo vac and was very disappointed. Instead of picking up dust, it blows it away from itself sometimes, doesn't get corners, keeps going over the same area, and I have to manually control it to actually vacuum. It's more of a pain for me to micro-manage it than to just go back to a regular vacuum. I wish I had used the vacuum earlier and gotten a refund.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend, great for dog hair (border collie)
customer_reviews.text: We have a border collie and a doberman that stay inside often with us. The border collie especially sheds a lot. This vaccuum does absolutely amazing. We were worried it wouldn't do super well since it's a lower price than competitors, but it does excellent. The battery lasts the full time, as advertised. We empty it about every 3rd time we use it. Overall- extremely happy with this purchase, would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: No Regrets!
customer_reviews.text: After researching for literally months, I finally landed on this vacuum. We don’t have animals in the house, unless you count the toddlers (major reason for buying a robotic vacuum). It has been a game changer. I honestly can’t believe how much it picks up. The dust pan is always full when I empty it. It comes with sooo many little handy tools for cleaning it. It’s quiet! I would definitely purchase again. This vacuum definitely pulls its weight in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Scra

customer_reviews.title: NOT for houses with rugs.
customer_reviews.text: I have one large area rug that extends under my couch. This machine gets stuck under the rug and I have to move the couch to get it out. In the bathrooms I have to pick up the floor mats because it can also get stuck in the edges. I have also noticed it does not pick up paper on the floor: hair and cat fur is great, but not paper.
customer_reviews.author: DrDean

customer_reviews.title: No longer charging within a year
customer_reviews.text: We were very excited about this item and used it about once a week since we got it. It did require maintenance - cleaning of the brush after every use, emptying of the bin and making sure the whiskers are clean and well as well. No problem doing that. About half a year into having it the battery starts lasting less and less until suddenly now it no longer charges at all. For the price we paid I was hoping for more than 10 months of life time from this item. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya V Belonozhko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome robot vac.
customer_reviews.text: This little “amazon recommend “ robot vac is awesome! If it quit tomorrow, I’d buy another tomorrow afternoon. Everyday when I empty it I’m amazed at what it has picked up. We just moved into a new house, it’s clean, we take our shoes off outside, and everyday it’s picked up the same amount of dirt. Auto starts at 7:30 every morning. On time, every time. Nice to walk around bare foot, and not feel any grit. No carpet here, just hardwood. Probably my favorite Amazon purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KH

customer_reviews.title: Needs too much room
customer_reviews.text: I just received this and read the manual. What is NOT in the product description is that you need free space of 3 ft. on each side and 6 ft. In front of the docking station AND needs to be against a wall. There is literally no place in our small home that meets those requirements. A better website description would have saved me, UPS, and Amazon a lot of trouble as I would not have ordered.
customer_reviews.author: amolba

customer_reviews.title: Sucky Robot  ; )
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved these robotic vacuum. It has two major draw backs. 1. If you have dogs or someone with long hair your in household. You’ll have to cut the hair out every day. 2. Because it cleans at random it doesn’t always cover every room when it’s in that room. We were surprised though how much this thing sucked up every time it cleaned. We vacuum bi-weekly with our Dyson Animal and we were blown away at how much stuff was left behind in our carpets.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl

customer_reviews.title: I did not think it could be this good
customer_reviews.text: I really didnt have high hopes for this to actually clean and do a good job. So happy I purchased it and got it during a sale. It really does an amazing job!! I have dogs that shed so I have to clean my entire house every 3 days and I can just let this robo go everyday for about an hr and my house stays perfectly clean. This can also clean under sofas, beds, chairs, etc for me so it helps so much to get the dust and hair from those places. Easily the best purchase of 2018 for myself, seriously, buy one. I no longer have to sweep up anymore!
customer_reviews.author: V

customer_reviews.title: I hate vacuuming!
customer_reviews.text: So far the Eufy is pretty cool! It’s easy to use, mostly. I’ve had to clean it out twice since we got it yesterday. I think that’s more about it’s willingness to go under a couch unlike everyone else in my house. So far, I’m happy! Update: I’m still happy, but the other reviewers are right. It really isn’t good on short pile carpet. Luckily most of my house is wood, but if your house is short pile carpet you might want to reconsider.
customer_reviews.author: OhioShopper

product_meta.title: eufy by Anker, BoostIQ RoboVac 11S (Slim), Robot Vacuum Cleaner, Super-Thin, 1300Pa Strong Suction, Quiet, Self-Charging Robotic Vacuum Cleaner, Cleans Hard Floors to Medium-Pile Carpets
product_meta.description: Color:BlackRoboVac 11S - RoboVac may be super-slim at 2. 85", but it’s packed with BoostIQ technology and up to 1300Pa of suction power to ensure your floors and carpets are clear of all dirt, dust, and crumbs. For Optimal Use: Use on low-pile carpet, tile, laminate, and hardwood floors. Not suitable for high-pile carpet . Move cables out of the way to avoid entanglement. Note: *Compared to previous eufy RoboVac models.
feature_bullets: "Best Robot Vacuum of 2018" by Digital Trends.
All-New RoboVac: Re-engineered to be the slimmest* RoboVac (2.85") but with quiet operation and increased suction at 1300Pa for up to 100 minutes** of constant, powerful suction.
BoostIQ Technology: Automatically increases suction power within 1.5 seconds when extra vacuuming strength is needed to get the best clean.

A Quiet Clean: Vacuums for up to 100 minutes** on hardwood floors with consistant, powerful suction at a volume no louder than an operating microwave. Premium Features: Anti-scratch tempered glass-top cover for protection, infrared-sensor for evading obstacles, and drop-sensing tech to avoid falls. Automatically recharges so it's always ready to clean.

What You Get: RoboVac 11S, remote control (2 AAA batteries included), charging base, AC power adapter, cleaning tool, extra set of high-performance filters, 4 side brushes, 5 cable ties, welcome guide and our worry-free 12-month warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars23,907 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
